name: Data-Aware Carrier Aggregation Configuration
summary: The feature provides improved uplink throughput for UEs with continuous and heavy uplink

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrHyst
parameters.description: This attribute controls the hysteresis of the buffer size threshold                                 for uplink-heavy UE detection.  It is not recommended to set this attribute to 0.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrThresh
parameters.description: This attribute controls the buffer size threshold for uplink-heavy UE                                 detection.  It is not recommended to set this attribute to 0. The recommended                                 value of this attribute is higher than the following:    The value of the                                             ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrHyst                                         attribute.     The multiplication of the                                             ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrHyst, and                                         the                                             ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeBsrThUlCaFactor                                         attributes.

parameters.name: ENodeBFunction.ulHeavyUeDetectTime
parameters.description: This attribute controls the detection window length for uplink-heavy                                 UE detection.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled
parameters.description: The Data-Aware Carrier Aggregation Configuration feature is not                                 operable if the                                     EUtranCellFDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled or                                     EUtranCellTDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled                                 attribute is set to false.

parameters.name: EUtranCellTDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled
parameters.description: The Data-Aware Carrier Aggregation Configuration feature is not                                 operable if the                                     EUtranCellFDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled or                                     EUtranCellTDD.ulHeavyUeDetectEnabled                                 attribute is set to false.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulSCellPriority
parameters.description: The attribute provides configuration options for the specific uplink                                 SCell or uplink SCell carrier prioritization function.

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.ulSCellPriority
parameters.description: The attribute provides configuration options for the specific uplink                                 SCell or uplink SCell carrier prioritization function.

parameters.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_TRAFFIC_REP  INTERNAL_PER_UETR_UE_TRAFFIC_REP
parameters.description: These parameters report average throughput, required TBS, and                                     uplink SCell activation state before and after an uplink SCell                                     configuration. When this feature is active, increased uplink                                     throughput is reported.

events.name: INTERNAL_PER_UE_TRAFFIC_REP  INTERNAL_PER_UETR_UE_TRAFFIC_REP
events.description: These parameters report average throughput, required TBS, and                                     uplink SCell activation state before and after an uplink SCell                                     configuration. When this feature is active, increased uplink                                     throughput is reported.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012383 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012383 MO instance.
